genius.name: Genius
genius.description: This task is activated by researching Philosphy, and completed by researching all technologies.

metropolis.name: Metropolis
metropolis.description: This task is activated by upgrading a city to level 2 (must be upgraded, not captured at that level), and completed by upgrading a city to level 5 (or capturing a city at level 5 or above).

network.name: Network
network.description: This task is activated by researching (or otherwise attaining) roads, and completed by connecting 5 cities to the capital with trade routes.

killer.name: Killer
killer.description: This task is activated by attacking and killing a unit, and completed by killing 10 units.

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.description: This task is activated by researching (or otherwise attaining) navigation, and completed by un-fogging every tile in the square.

wealth.name: Wealth
wealth.description: This task is activated by researching (or otherwise attaining) trade, and completed by having 100 or more stars at any one time.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.description: This task is activated by researching (or otherwise attaining) meditation, and completed by making no attacks for 5 consecutive turns. Freezing, mind bending or retaliating does not count.
